title: How to Get the Alien Blaster in Fallout 4

steps.headline: Wander the Wasteland.
steps.description: The Alien Blaster will become available at random times.

steps.headline: Look out for unidentified flying objects.
steps.description: Availability will be signaled by a UFO rocketing past you in the sky.

steps.headline: Follow the UFO.
steps.description: If you lose it, don't worry. It crash lands just East of Oberland Station.

steps.headline: Approach the wreckage of the UFO.
steps.description: It will be abandoned, with a blood trail leading away.

steps.headline: Follow the blood trail to a nearby cave.
steps.description: Equip a gun and enter the cave.

steps.headline: Locate the alien.
steps.description: He will be huddling near the end of the cave with some scrounged supplies near a corpse.

steps.headline: Make sure you are hidden.
steps.description: While hidden, shoot the alien. Make sure it doesn't have a chance to fight back, as the Alien Blaster has devastating effects.

steps.headline: Loot the alien's corpse.
steps.description: You will find the Alien Blaster and several hundred rounds.

text: Start Fallout 4. Exit the Vault to begin. Wander the Wasteland. The Alien Blaster will become available at random times. Look out for unidentified flying objects. Availability will be signaled by a UFO rocketing past you in the sky. Follow the UFO. If you lose it, don't worry. It crash lands just East of Oberland Station. Approach the wreckage of the UFO. It will be abandoned, with a blood trail leading away. Follow the blood trail to a nearby cave. Equip a gun and enter the cave. Locate the alien. He will be huddling near the end of the cave with some scrounged supplies near a corpse. Make sure you are hidden. While hidden, shoot the alien. Make sure it doesn't have a chance to fight back, as the Alien Blaster has devastating effects. Loot the alien's corpse. You will find the Alien Blaster and several hundred rounds.
